author: Aaron Lorenzo
title: IRS temporarily shutters its last service center
description: The Treasury Department is still on track to begin making the stimulus payments next week, a source in the department said.
content:
The Treasury Department is still on track to begin making the stimulus payments next week, a source in the department said. An IRS spokesperson did not respond to a request for comment.
The Ogden facility is focused on dealing with large-business taxpayers. … [+994 chars]
